I just wanted to say hello. For now I will be heavy on the learning side
as=
 I am very new to the study. I am reading The Samurai Sword by
Yumoto, The =
Japanese Sword by Santo and The Connoisseur's Book Of
Japanese's Swords by =
Nagayma. I have joined some other forums. I look
forward to becoming a memb=
er of the Northern California Japanese Sword
Club. It would also be great t=
o meet someone in my area. Is there 
anything else I should be doing for st=
arters? Thanks for
letting me join your group.
Have a great New Year!
Paul =
